summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1538, for the improvement of Jefferson Street, in the City of Seattle, from Third Avenue to Fourth Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing brick gutters, granite curbs and concrete sidewalks thereon, and by making such extensions as may be necessary to the existing water main system, under Ordinance No. 16649, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
